about_the_game:
Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the fanatsy world named "Artcaster". You start at the small island named Romo. After years of waiting you are finally old enough to search you father, who was fighting for the King of Artcaster many years ago. You journey begins at the Angora Forest which is located at the North of Romo. At jour Journey you will get many friends and maybe a companion who helps you at the fights.
Traveler of Artcaster is an 2D Rpg game with a leveling and fighting system. It uses a multiple choice framework. That means that you decide your own fate and every player may have a different ending.
detailed_description:
About A&D

A&D Cooperation was founded in 2020 and has 2 developers. We are a very small studio an happy about every support we can get from you!
You want to support us? Buy our game and/or support us on Patreon!
Patreon:


About the Game


Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the fanatsy world named "Artcaster". You start at the small island named Romo. After years of waiting you are finally old enough to search you father, who was fighting for the King of Artcaster many years ago. You journey begins at the Angora Forest which is located at the North of Romo. At jour Journey you will get many friends and maybe a companion who helps you at the fights.
Traveler of Artcaster is an 2D Rpg game with a leveling and fighting system. It uses a multiple choice framework. That means that you decide your own fate and every player may have a different ending.
legal_notice: This game is based on and created with the RPG Maker.
name: Traveler of Artcaster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 / AMD A8-7600 APU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line) with OpenGL 4.41 Discrete: Nvidia GeForce 400 Series or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series with OpenGL 4.4
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD A10-7800 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 Series or AMD Radeon Rx 200 Series (excluding integrated chipsets) with OpenGL 4.5
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Traveler of Artcaster is an indie adventure Rpg taking place in the mystic world named "Artcaster". Your character explores a huge open world to find his/her father who was fighting for the king of Artcaster. But with this search a big journey with many friends and enemies begins.
